channel.title: 667 shop wont buy
channel.description: i run a 667 server but none of the shopkeepers in edge or varrock or lumby will buy any items it says cannot be sold for every item, is there a fix for this please let m know

item.title: 667 shop wont buy
item.dc:creator: @svrking27 svrking27
item.description:
@svrking27 wrote:

thank you very much

Read full topic

item.title: 667 shop wont buy
item.dc:creator: @blakew blakew
item.description:
@blakew wrote:

In Unpackedshops.txt change false to true. False = not general store (you cant sell items), True = general store(can sell items to it)

Read full topic

item.title: 667 shop wont buy
item.dc:creator: @svrking27 svrking27
item.description:
@svrking27 wrote:

thanks but it idnt work. what it is is that the general stores in edge and varrock and all, refuse to buy items. whenever u try it ays item cannot be sold at this store, and that is for every single item

Read full topic

item.title: 667 shop wont buy
item.dc:creator: @blakew blakew
item.description:
@blakew wrote:

You might want to look at unpackedshops.txt in data/items and also look at shop.java in com.rs.player.content and then to repack shops you need to delete packedShops.dat and then re run the server and your shops will pack. Not sure if this will fix the problem or not but you could at least try. I haven’t seen anybody else with this problem :l

Another thing is… You should really use Eclipse IDE because it will help you code in the future and it auto compiles everytime you save a file.

Read full topic
